mutants.code:
def decimalToHex(n):
    hex_map = ''
    hex_str = ''
    while n:
        hex_str = hex_map[n % 16] + hex_str
        n //= 16
    return hex_str

def decimalToHex(n):
    hex_map = '0123456789ABCDEF'
    hex_str = 'MUTATED'
    while n:
        hex_str = hex_map[n % 16] + hex_str
        n //= 16
    return hex_str

    hex_map = '0123456789ABCDEF'
    hex_str = ''
    while n:
        hex_str = hex_map[n % 16] - hex_str
        n //= 16
    return hex_str
